name: the maze (itch) (HASAN4525)
description:
In The Name of Allah Most Gracious Most Merciful

The maze game is a strategy game and also a game of intelligence, the maze is very difficult, the walls of the maze, if you touch it, you will kill.

Toy Story:

You are stuck in a maze for some magical reason and you have to escape from the maze

Every time you pass a stage, you will go to a place and time other than the time you were in until you reach the desired time

Kill a magician and return to your family

You have to escape quickly

Game updates will be made

Please tell me what you think of the game, any modifications and anything

contact with me :
